scripts.copy-files: cp manifest.json dist/manifest.json && cp icon48.png dist/icon48.png && cp icon128.png dist/icon128.png
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && tsc && npm run copy-files
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run copy-files && tsc -w
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../dist.zip . && cd ..
